summary: This mod enables the ability to craft and use bound weapons!
descriptionHtml:
Hello and welcome to my First Mod!
I hope you enjoy your stay and find it nice and relaxing here!

Anywho, This mod is designed to allow you to craft and permanantly use bound weaponry!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Crafting:

The items available for crafting are:
Bound Sword
Bound BattleAxe
Bound Bow
Bound Arrows

All of the weapons can be found within the "Misc" smithing tab and require no perks in order to craft.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Recipe:
The weapons require Malachite, Daedra Hearts, Ectoplasm, Soul gems, and Nordic Barnicles.
I'd like to thank Gerandirr for the recipes!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Stats:
All of these weapons are slightly worse in stats than the daedric equivilant.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Location:
The weapons are located in a small chest in a room to the right of the entrance of Whiterun.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Once again, Thank you so much for looking at my mod!
Please comment with any feedback, because I'd love to improve this mod!
-Legorox
author: Legorox

files.name: Craftable Bound Weapons
files.changelogHtml:
Made recipies easier for crafting
Nerfed weapons to fit with new recipies
Added cheaty location in the entrance to Whiterun
